00175     // Insert methods that allocate and insert a copy.
00176     // These are called from GUI to work around early garbage collection
00177     void insertNewValueNode(int index, const ControlLinearNode& newNode) {
00178         _xNodes.insert(index, (ControlLinearNode*) newNode.copy());
00179     }
00180     void insertNewMinNode(int index, const ControlLinearNode& newNode) {
00181         _minNodes.insert(index, (ControlLinearNode*) newNode.copy());
00182     }
00183     void insertNewMaxNode(int index, const ControlLinearNode& newNode) {
00184         _maxNodes.insert(index, (ControlLinearNode*) newNode.copy());
00185     }
